name: Icy Mishaps
description:
Icy Mishaps

A 1-bit ish retro game made for the 1-bit weekend jam.

Skate your way to victory with your strange skating partner who does everything you do, but backwards!

All content was created for the jam (you can probably tell) with the exception of the font.

Controls

Movement - WSAD, Arrow Keys or Gamepad

P to shift palette

Thanks for checking out the game!

Font - [SH Pinscher)]by Design Sayshu

Thanks to skoo for testing all levels at least once, and for hating the music even more than I do.
